text.jpText: ねえ、三日月あなたも 迷う時があるの？
text.enText: Oh, crescent moon up above, \nDo you ever question yourself?

text.jpText: 手かざせば今夜も たおやかな光
text.enText: I reach out to you again,\nAnd you share a comforting glow

text.jpText: 朧げにただ 浮かぶ明かりを
text.enText: Hidden behind the clouds,\nYour light softly peeking out

text.jpText: 追いかけて駆けだすの
text.enText: Here I am reaching up to you again

text.jpText: 声にならずに消えた想い
text.enText: All the things I never said, start to vanish as I

text.jpText: 私のささやかな祈り今
text.enText: All the thoughts I want to share become a little prayer
Cast into the sky, amidst starlight

text.jpText: いつかあなたのように誰かのことを
text.enText: I wish that someday I'll be like you, \nAnd that maybe I could too

text.jpText: 照らせる人になりたいだけ
text.enText: Give light to someone else in need
